name: OCastReferenceDriver
summary: OCastReferenceDriver provides a reference driver implementation for the OCast SDK.
description:
OCastReferenceDriver provides a reference driver implementation for the OCast SDK.
This driver allows the OCast SDK to connect to a remote device that is in conformance with this driver.
The OCast SDK is available at https://bitbucket.devops.nonprod.empf.local/scm/react/OCast-iOS.
